title: B! Machine - Evening Bell - Limited box set 4 CDs
description:
B! Machine - Evening Bell - Limited box set

I am currently trying to finish off the Hybrid, Opal and Umbrella torrent that is out there.  Bunch of us are stuck at 98%. Hopefully someone will hear my cry and hook us up with the 2%.

Limited edition box set consisting of: 

Disc 1 (ADDCD1167): \"The Evening Bell\" (CD) 
Disc 2 (ADDCD1167b): Alternates from the Forthcoming EP \"The Piano Sketches\" (CD3\") 
Disc 3 (ADDCD1167c): Alternates from the Forthcoming EP \"The Falling Star\" (CD3\") 
Disc 4 (ADDPROMO13): A Different Drum Megamix (Mix CD) 

All words and music on Discs 1-3 written by Nate Nicoll 
Disc 4 mixed live by DJ Copper Top
